long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase video player size on floatplane.com similar to YouTube cinema mode. All this is doing currently is increasing the max-width of the video player container to 1920px so that 1080p video is displayed at full resolution. Preference is stored in local storage. I may update this to also apply a semi-opaque layer to the rest of the page for a more immersive viewing experience.
